mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO FIELD ( FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_AREA, FIELD_DATE, FIELD_COUNT, FIELD_SIZE, PARKING, MATCH_GENDER, SHOES, MANAGER, MATCH_LEVEL, MATCH_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, MATCH_PAY, CATEGORY_NUM ) VALUES (
SEQ_FIELD.NEXTVAL, #{fieldName}, #{fieldArea}, #{fieldDate}, #{fieldCount}, #{fieldSize}, #{parking}, #{matchGender}, #{shoes}, #{manager}, #{matchLevel}, #{matchType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{matchPay}, #{categoryNum} )

INSERT INTO FIELD_IMG ( FIELD_IMG_NO, FIELD_URL, FIELD_ORIGIN_NAME, FIELD_CHANGE_NAME, DLELTE_FIELD_IMG, FIELD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_FIELD_IMG.NEXTVAL, #{fieldUrl}, #{fieldOriginName}, #{fieldChangeName}, 'N', SEQ_field.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_AREA, FIELD_COUNT, FIELD_DATE, MATCH_GENDER, MATCH_LEVEL, START_TIME, CATEGORY_NUM FROM FIELD WHERE CATEGORY_NUM = #{categoryNum} AND FIELD_AREA LIKE '%' || #{fieldArea} || '%' AND MATCH_GENDER = #{matchGender} AND MATCH_LEVEL = #{matchLevel} AND FIELD_DATE = #{fieldDate} AND SYSDATE < TO_DATE(FIELD_DATE || ' ' || START_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')

SELECT FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_AREA, FIELD_DATE, FIELD_ENROLL_DATE, FIELD_COUNT, FIELD_SIZE, PARKING, MATCH_GENDER, SHOES, MANAGER, MATCH_LEVEL, MATCH_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, MATCH_PAY, CATEGORY_NUM FROM FIELD WHERE FIELD_NO = #{fieldNo}
SELECT FIELD_NO, COUNT(*) as "FIELD_COUNT" FROM RESERVATION GROUP BY FIELD_NO
SELECT FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, CATEGORY_NUM FROM FIELD WHERE FIELD_NAME like '%'||#{searchMain}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( RES_NO, RES_DATE, RES_USER_NO, FIELD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RESERVATION.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{resUserNo}, #{fieldNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT FIELD_IMG_NO, FIELD_URL, FIELD_ORIGIN_NAME, FIELD_CHANGE_NAME FROM FIELD_IMG WHERE FIELD_NO = #{fieldNo}

SELECT RES_NO, RES_USER_NO, FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_DATE, START_TIME, CATEGORY_NUM FROM RESERVATION JOIN FIELD USING (FIELD_NO) WHERE RES_USER_NO = #{resUserNo} AND SYSDATE < TO_DATE(FIELD_DATE || ' ' || START_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ORDER BY FIELD_DATE, START_TIME
SELECT FIELD_DATE FROM RESERVATION JOIN FIELD USING (FIELD_NO) WHERE RES_USER_NO = #{userNo} AND SYSDATE < TO_DATE(FIELD_DATE || ' ' || START_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') GROUP BY FIELD_DATE

SELECT FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, CATEGORY_NUM, FIELD_DATE, START_TIME, RES_NO FROM RESERVATION JOIN FIELD USING (FIELD_NO) WHERE RES_USER_NO = #{resUserNo} AND FIELD_DATE = #{fieldDate} AND SYSDATE < TO_DATE(FIELD_DATE || ' ' || START_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ORDER BY FIELD_DATE

SELECT FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, CATEGORY_NUM, FIELD_DATE, START_TIME, RES_NO FROM RESERVATION JOIN FIELD USING (FIELD_NO) WHERE RES_USER_NO = #{resUserNo} AND SYSDATE < TO_DATE(FIELD_DATE || ' ' || START_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ORDER BY FIELD_DATE

SELECT FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_AREA, FIELD_DATE, FIELD_ENROLL_DATE, FIELD_COUNT, FIELD_SIZE, PARKING, MATCH_GENDER, SHOES, MANAGER, MATCH_LEVEL, MATCH_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, MATCH_PAY, CATEGORY_NUM FROM FIELD WHERE MANAGER = #{userName} AND TO_TIMESTAMP(FIELD_DATE || ' ' || END_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') < SYSTIMESTAMP

SELECT MB.USER_NAME, MB.USER_NO, RES.RES_NO, RES.RES_DATE, RES.RES_USER_NO, RES.FIELD_NO, SPO.SPORT_LEVEL, SPO.SPORT_SCORE, SPO.SPORT_COUNT, SPO.SPORT_SMILE, SPO.SPORT_YELLOW, SPO.SPORT_RED, SPO.STYLE, SPO.SKILL, SPO.USER_NO, SPO.CATEGORY_NUM FROM SPORTINFO "SPO" JOIN RESERVATION "RES" ON(RES.RES_USER_NO = SPO.USER_NO) JOIN MEMBER "MB" ON(MB.USER_NO = SPO.USER_NO) WHERE FIELD_NO = #{fieldNo} AND CATEGORY_NUM = #{categoryNum}
SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_WRITER, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DATE, USER_NO FROM REPLY WHERE FIELD_NO = #{fno}
SELECT REVIEW_NO, FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_AREA FROM FIELD_REVIEW JOIN FIELD USING (FIELD_NO) WHERE FIELD_NO = #{fno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FIELD_REVIEW

SELECT FR.REVIEW_NO, M.USER_NAME, F.FIELD_NAME, F.FIELD_AREA, FR.REVIEW_COUNT, FR.REVIEW_ENROLL_DATE, FR.STAR_RATING, SC.CATEGORY_NUM FROM FIELD_REVIEW FR LEFT JOIN SPORT_CATEGORY SC ON FR.CATEGORY_NUM = SC.CATEGORY_NUM JOIN MEMBER M ON FR.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN FIELD F ON FR.FIELD_NO = F.FIELD_NO WHERE FR.FIELD_REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FR.REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT FR.REVIEW_NO, M.USER_NAME, F.FIELD_NAME, F.FIELD_AREA, FR.REVIEW_COUNT, FR.REVIEW_ENROLL_DATE, FR.STAR_RATING, SC.CATEGORY_NUM FROM FIELD_REVIEW FR LEFT JOIN SPORT_CATEGORY SC ON FR.CATEGORY_NUM = SC.CATEGORY_NUM JOIN MEMBER M ON FR.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN FIELD F ON FR.FIELD_NO = F.FIELD_NO WHERE FR.FIELD_REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_NUM = #{categoryNum} ORDER BY FR.REVIEW_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FIELD_REVIEW( REVIEW_NO, FIELD_NO, USER_NO, CATEGORY_NUM, REVIEW_COUNT, REVIEW_CONTENT, STAR_RATING ) VALUES ( SEQ_FIELD_REVIEW.NEXTVAL, #{fieldNo}, #{userNo}, #{categoryNum}, 0, #{reviewContent}, #{starRating} )

INSERT INTO REVIEW_IMG ( REVIEW_IMG_NO, REVIEW_URL, REVIEW_ORIGIN_NAME, REVIEW_CHANGE_NAME, DLELTE_REVIEW_IMG, REVIEW_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_IMG.NEXTVAL, #{reviewUrl}, #{reviewOriginName}, #{reviewChangeName}, 'N', SEQ_FIELD_REVIEW.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_IMG_NO, REVIEW_URL, REVIEW_ORIGIN_NAME, REVIEW_CHANGE_NAME FROM REVIEW_IMG WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{rno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLYREPLY ( REPLYREPLY_NO, REPLYREPLY_CONTENT, USER_NO, REPLY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPLYREPLY.NEXTVAL, #{replyReplyContent}, #{userNo}, #{replyNo} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FIELD_REVIEW FR JOIN FIELD F USING (FIELD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE FR.FIELD_REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.USER_NAME
AND F.FIELD_NAME
AND FR.FIELD_CONTENT
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} ||'%'

SELECT FR.REVIEW_NO, M.USER_NAME, F.FIELD_NAME, F.FIELD_AREA, FR.REVIEW_COUNT, FR.REVIEW_ENROLL_DATE, FR.STAR_RATING FROM FIELD_REVIEW FR JOIN FIELD F USING (FIELD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE FR.FIELD_REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
AND M.USER_NAME
AND F.FIELD_NAME

SELECT USER_NAME, REPLYREPLY_DATE, REPLYREPLY_CONTENT, USER_NO, REPLYREPLY_NO, REPLY_NO FROM REPLYREPLY JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( REPLY_NO, REPLY_WRITER, REPLY_CONTENT, USER_NO, FIELD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContent}, #{userNo}, #{fieldNo} )
